title: Gene therapy method developed to target damaged kidney cells

title_detail.value: Gene therapy method developed to target damaged kidney cells

summary: Research has shown, in mice, that genetic material can be delivered to damaged cells in the kidneys, a key step toward developing gene therapy to treat chronic kidney disease. The potentially fatal condition affects 30 million Americans, most of whom don't realize they have chronic kidney disease.
